results.content: Many concepts just passed by, but still a nice tutorial course

results.content: Fue interesante y un buen curso, pero fue un poco desordenado en algunos capítulos. Además, un par de capítulos tenían un pésimo audio.

response.content:
Hi Felipe, thank you very much for your feedback.
You can see in the new section of the course that the sound is much better now since I purchased a top of the line microphone.
Also, please see that I'm going to cover real world projects like a blog site using Angular material and Ngx-Bootstrap, Font-Awesome nad much more.
Please consider updating the feedback to 5*.
Thanks,
Lior

results.content: Everything is perfect. Seems good one for beginners who are trying Angular for first time in their life.

response.content: Hi Manoj, thanks for your review. The plan is to add as much value as possible so that people taking the course will go from beginner to pro in no time :)
